job_description: We are hiring a Senior Accountant to own the monthly close and deliver accurate financial statements. Responsibilities include general ledger accounting, journal entries, accruals and prepaids, balance sheet reconciliations, AP/AR review, fixed assets and depreciation, variance analysis, and supporting external audit. Requirements: 3+ years accounting experience, strong Excel (pivot tables, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP), knowledge of GAAP/IFRS, experience with ERP systems (SAP/Oracle/NetSuite) and/or QuickBooks, and strong attention to detail.
